DOC.brief_title: An Open Positron Emission Tomography Study Assess Effects Varying Mass AZD4694 Radioligand Binding Parameters Healthy Volunteers Patients With Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Open-Label Positron Emission Tomography Study Selective Beta Amyloid Radioligand ( 18Fluor ) AZD4694 Assess Effects Varying Mass AZD4694 Radioligand Binding Parameters Healthy Volunteers Patients Alzheimer 's Disease

Current major depressive disorder major psychiatric disorder accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , edition 4 , American Psychiatric Association 1994 criterion ( Alzheimer 's disease patient ) . Depression : Cornell Depression Rating > 9 ( Alzheimer 's disease patient ) . Abnormal vital sign define follow : Systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg , Diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg , heart rate < 40 > 85 beat per minute ( Alzheimer 's disease patient ) . Myocardial infarction acute coronary syndrome within last year ( Alzheimer 's disease patient ) . Had Positron Emission Tomography measurement scientific purpose within last 12 month .
